attributes.founder: '''Stonedance''' is a castle in the Crownlands, the region controlled directly by the Iron Throne in King's Landing. The castle is located south of Sharp Point, on the peninsula south of Blackwater Bay.<ref>The Wolf and the Lion</ref>==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels Stonedance is the seat of House Massey, which gives the peninsula its name of Massey's Hook.==See also==* AWOIAF==References==reflistThe CrownlandsCategory:CastlesCategory:LocationsCategory:Locations in the Crownlands

'''Stonedance''' is a castle in [[the Crownlands]], the region controlled directly by the [[Iron Throne]] in [[King's Landing]]. The castle is located south of [[Sharp Point]], on the peninsula south of [[Blackwater Bay]].<ref>[[The Wolf and the Lion]]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels Stonedance is the seat of House Massey, which gives the peninsula its name of Massey's Hook.
